So, hey there, guys, here i am gonna review one of the most legendary games of the 2000's, Counter-Strike: Source. 
Here i ve spent the rest of my youth, i played it despite my mother advise and i was visiting gun gamer and deathmatch servers every single day of the week. 
So, if u just want to throw yourself to the past of games generation - this is your choice, 
Graphics which Valve provide is very qualified and every single PC can afford playing this game without any lags.
